title: Sausage and Vegetable Stovie
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '2 large onions, coarsely chopped', '500g sausages', '3 large potatoes, cubed', '2 carrots, sliced', '2 swede, peeled and cubed', '75ml chicken stock', '1/4 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce (optional)', 'salt and pepper to taste']
